lenders.name: lytingapplicate
lenders.occupational_info:
Acuity Brands’ Gotham Lighting is one of the leading developers and providers of downlights in the lighting industry today. Offering both aesthetics and quality illumination, Gotham’s downlights are the preferred downlighting solutions for a variety of applications. Its collection of high-quality square downlights is also the most used downlights for applications where visual comfort and aesthetics are both desired. 
Gotham’s decorative recessed lighting solutions are made with premium components to ensure durability and reliability. They are also designed to offer superior beam control and maximum energy savings. With these downlights, you can enjoy high-quality lighting and an enhanced visual space without having to worry about energy consumption. 
With their sustainability and lighting quality, Gotham’s downlights are often used in regularly populated spaces such as in offices and schools. They are also often utilized for church lighting and airport lighting. For high-quality decorative recessed lighting, Gotham remains the leading authority in the lighting industry. 
Read more about Lighting Applications by Acuity Brands through these sites

lenders.name: charlottegunsyfs
lenders.occupational_info:
A handgun safe is designed to protect and secure your firearms. Depending on the design, a gun safe can protect your firearms from fire and water but all gun safes will protect from theft. Most importantly, a gun safe is a responsible way of storing your handguns and will ensure that they will not be misused. A number of states have already made it a standard law for people who own guns to also have gun safes and has significantly improved gun safety levels, especially from the dangers of untrained handling. 
When shopping for gun safes, you will find a lot of models with a variety of features. These include fire resistance, water damage resistance and a wide array of lock-types. The kind of gun safe that will best suit you depends on the kind of guns that you keep and what you keep them for. 
For those who keep handguns for home protection, a small-sized gun safe would be best since it can be kept near the bed as well as in other accessible places. A digital lock that will require a PIN to open would also be preferable since it would be the easiest and fastest to open especially when under duress. A biometric lock, or one that reads your fingerprint before allowing access, would be even better since it would make the safe faster to open but also just as secure. 
For gun collectors, a medium or large gun safe would be the better choice for storing multiple firearms. You should also get gun safes that are fireproof and also protects from water damage. These gun safes should have Underwriters Laboratory (UL) ratings for the level of fire protection and water damage protection that it can offer.  If you are a gun collector that also seeks to display your collection as well as keep them safe and secure, a gun safe with a clear tempered glass door would be a good investment. 
Hopefully this article helps in choosing and buying the gun safe that best fits your needs. With the security that it offers both your firearms and the other members of your household, a gun safe is a great investment for every gun owner. 
Read more about Charlotte Guns Safe through these sites
Charlotte Gun Safes
Charlotte Gun Safe
Charlotte Buy Gun Safe
Charlotte Buy Gun Safes
Gun Safes Charlotte
Gun Safe Charlotte
Buy Gun Safe Charlotte
Buy Gun Safes Charlotte

lenders.name: Hermes De Medici LLC
lenders.loan_because:
We just wanted to contribute to a worthy cause...
After carefully examining several different charities and non-profit organizations, we finally narrowed it down to KIVA.

KIVA is an organization that "Got it Right" in our eyes. Their concept is the only one that really excited us when we first started searching. The idea of loaning money to people so they could "help themselves" was such a great concept that we quickly registered on their site and started our little campaign.

We have decided to contribute 5% of ALL sales generated on ANY of our ecommerce Web sites!

It's a great feeling to know that you are not simply GIVING your money to someone that may-or-may-not do the "right" things with that money. Instead, you're LENDING someone money so that they can help themselves.

KIVA has a network of businesses and individuals that lend money to people in need - all across the globe. These people are able to provide for themselves if they were able to get just 'little' help.

Many are farmers that need fertalizer, some are mothers that are running a small business and need supplies or stock, but almost ALL are worthy of a loan and we were really surprised at how many of them pay it back!

The marjority of the people keep their word and pay the loan back (wish I could say the same here). When money is paid back, it can become a loan for someone else. And, THAT is what makes this the best concept ever created by a non-profit or charity.
Your small loan can continue to help people over and over again!

We encourage you to at least take a look at their site and hear their story. It moved us and we believe you will feel the same.
lenders.occupational_info: We develop software and provide Web marketing platforms for companies across different industries.
